remarks: Lemma for ~ onsucelsucexmid .  The set ` { x e. { (/) , { (/) } } | ( x = (/) \/ ph ) } ` appears as ` A ` in the proof of Theorem 1.3 in [Bauer] p. 483 (see ~ acexmidlema ), and similar sets also appear in other proofs that various propositions imply excluded middle, for example in ~ ordtriexmidlem .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 2-Aug-2019.)
statement:
onsucelsucexmidlem $p |- { x e. { (/) , { (/) } } | ( x = (/) \/ ph ) } e. On $.
$d ph x $.
